quest.name: Digging Deeper
journal: New orders await you and Oschon's Raiders.

Haimirich informs you that your mission today is one of exploration. It appears that your successes have led to further prestige for House Fortemps, and this has agitated old rivalries amongst the nobility. Subsequently, your employers are called upon to do even more, and thus you and Oschon's Raiders have been asked to find out what, if anything, lies beneath the ground of the Makers' Quarter. Make your way to the Dravanian hinterlands and rendezvous with Haimirich.

You arrive to find that Haimirich has hired a white-haired naturalist to aid with your survey. Since the area is largely unexplored─by Ishgardians, at any rate─the captain asks that you find three mining points, and see if you can dig up any samples.
You have found three samples of some metal unknown to you. Deliver them to Haimirich.

Upon examining the samples, the naturalist lets out an astounded cry─all three contain traces of hardsilver. The metal is rare and extremely valuable, he tells you. Haimirich is greatly pleased to hear this, and bids you mine ten chunks of ore. As before, dig at nearby mineral deposits and return to Haimirich with the fruit of your quarrying.

While Haimirich is thankful for the hardsilver, he has grown worried about the Dravanians in the surrounding area. However, just before he can sound the retreat, Muscles tells him that Hatchling has chased down some monsters by himself. The boy returns to a furious captain, who berates him for his irresponsibility. With the mood grown somber, Haimirich tells you brusquely to find your own way back to Ishgard. Return to the Holy See, and speak with Haimirich at the Forgotten Knight in hopes that he will be in better spirits.

Haimirich regrets his earlier outburst. He admits that he is hard on Hatchling because he sees potential in the boy. Moreover, the captain does not wish him to die as his own brother did. In any case, he bids you await the next job.

※The next miner quest will be available from Haimirich upon reaching level 60.
objectives: Speak with Haimirich in the Makers' Quarter.
Deliver the chunks of unidentifiable ore to Haimirich.
Mine hardsilver oreDeliver the chunks of hardsilver ore to Haimirich.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: We've got new marchin' orders, Professor. This time, we're to explore some uncharted land, an' see if there's anythin' o' mineral value beneath it.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Problem is, this land's in the Dravanian hinterlands─jus' beyond the Horde. An' they're not overly fond of us, in case you forgot.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Now, you may be wonderin' how we landed this job. Some don't take kindly to House Fortemps's successes, our successes. These people're demandin' ridiculous things now, an' the count has called on us to deliver.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: But it's not all bleak news─word is that there's a little settlement o' 'venturers sprung up in the hinterlands. The lads an' I will go on ahead, an' see if they'll let us set up camp there.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: We'll meet in the Makers' Quarter─ought to be safe enough there. Jus' come when you're ready.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: That one knight talked o' goin' by airship, but I told him none of us need the coddlin'. But be careful o' the dragons, all the same.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Once you've gotten your tools together, come to the Makers' Quarter.

dialogue.name: BABYCHOCO
dialogue.text: What the hells're the nobles thinkin', sendin' us into danger like this!? There's only so many of us Raiders!

dialogue.name: STRONGARM
dialogue.text: Yes?

dialogue.name: DOCTOR02083
dialogue.text: Ah, well met, my dear ladysir. Haimirich practically sang your praises all the way here!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Professor, I'm right glad to see you made it here safe.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Now, to work. The Holy See's got no idea what's here. Could be dirt, or it could be gold. So, we're to find out what minerals're 'neath the ground.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: My friend here is a proper naturalist. We've got a professor already, so I've taken to callin' him Rocky. Heh, two academics─we're movin' up in the world, lads!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Now, Rocky'll need somethin' to examine. Diggin' it up's your job, Professor. Get a few samples─three should do it─an' bring 'em back here to me. Godsspeed!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Hm? Why three places? Rocky told me three'd be best. Jus' don't be tardy, eh?

dialogue.name: BABYCHOCO
dialogue.text: This job's bound to be dangerous, Professor. Watch yer back, eh?

dialogue.name: STRONGARM
dialogue.text: Yes?

dialogue.name: DOCTOR02083
dialogue.text: My life's work has been the study of minerals. Why, you might even say I “mine” them for secrets, heh heheh...heh... Forgive me, ladysir, I'm a bit nervous. It's my first time out in the field.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain a chunk of unidentifiable ore from the mining point.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Have you found somethin'?

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: That's my Professor! Now, Rocky, earn your keep. What are these samples?

dialogue.name: DOCTOR02083
dialogue.text: Dear me! These all contain hardsilver! It's a metal worth twice its weight in gold! Why, if you but dig a little deeper, you might well find a mountain of the stuff!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Hah! That's music to my ears! Professor, let's see if we can't prove there is a mountain 'neath our feet. You know what to do─find me ten chunks o' ore!

dialogue.name: DOCTOR02083
dialogue.text: Bless my soul, my dear ladysir, hardsilver!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: If there's no hardsilver to be had, that's fine, Professor. Jus' don't dally. A Dravanian patrol might swing through here any moment...

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: You're a wonder, Professor! Well, Raiders, let's pack up an' get the hells out o' he─

dialogue.name: STRONGARM
dialogue.text: Captain! We were attacked by mechanical men, and Hatchling gave chase!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: What? He didn't go by himself, did he!?

dialogue.name: STRONGARM
dialogue.text: He did.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: That stupid, stupid boy! If he comes back alive, I'll beat him bloody!

dialogue.name: BABYCHOCO
dialogue.text: Sorry fer keepin' ye waitin', Cap'n! We don't need to fear them monsters no more─though it weren't easy puttin' 'em down!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: You arrogant little arse! I told you not to run off on your own! Didn't that penetrate your thick skull!?

dialogue.name: BABYCHOCO
dialogue.text: Wh-What choice'd I have, Cap'n!? They were makin' fer the camp─'twas us or them!

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Then why not warn us!? Was your linkpearl broke? Don't tell me you didn't have the time!

dialogue.name: BABYCHOCO
dialogue.text: B-But, Cap'n, I...I... Fine. I'm sorry! No bloody good deed goes unpunished in this swivin' company...

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: ...We're done here. Get yourself home to Ishgard, Professor. I'll see you there.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Professor, thank you for today. You always do what I ask o' you─keep a level head, an' get your job done.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: Sorry about that business with Hatchlin'. Shouldn't have been so hard on the boy. I jus'...I jus' want him to grow up proper. Like my little brother should've.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: He was a Raider, too. Looked a fair bit like Hatchlin', as it happens. But he's long gone.

dialogue.name: HEIMIRICH
dialogue.text: I'll bet everyone an' their mother's got a sad story, eh? There's sure to be a new job comin' before long. I'll jus' drown me troubles till then.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To be deleted.
